          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Millikan's experiment</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Experiment Millikans</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'expérience de Millikan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Experiência de Millikan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esperimento del Millikan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πείραμα Millikan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Experimento de Millikan</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the 'oil drop' experiment conducted by Robert Millikan. The oil drops ionised in air by X-ray bombardment produce negative charges from which electron charge can be derived.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">robert millikan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">x-ray bombardment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electron mass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ionisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">negative charges</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt das ' Öltropfen' 
Experiment, das von Robert Millikan geleitet wird. Die 
Öltropfen, die einer Luft durch X-ray Bombardierung ionisiert werden,
produzieren negative Ladungen, von denen Elektronladung berechnet 
werden kann.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'expérience 'de 
baisse d'huile 'entreprise par Robert Millikan. Les baisses 
d'huile se sont ionisées en air par les charges négatives de produit
de bombardement de X-ray desquelles la charge d'électron peut être 
dérivée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra ' a experiência da gota
do óleo ' conduzida por Robert Millikan. As gotas do óleo 
ionizadas no ar pelo bombardeio de Raio X produzem as cargas negativas
de que a carga do elétron pode ser derivada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra 'l'esperimento di 
goccia dell'olio 'eseguito da Robert Millikan. Le gocce 
dell'olio ionizzate in aria tramite il bombardamento dei X-ray 
producono le cariche negative da cui la carica dell'elettrone può 
essere derivata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει πείραμα "απελευθέρωσης 
πετρελαίου" που πραγματοποιείται από Robert Millikan. 
Οι απελευθερώσεις πετρελαίου που ιονίζονται στον αέρα από 
τον των ακτίνων X βομβαρδισμό παράγουν τις αρνητικές δαπάνες 
από τις οποίες η δαπάνη ηλεκτρονίων μπορεί να προέλθει.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra ' el experimento de la 
gota del aceite ' conducido por Roberto Millikan. Las gotas del 
aceite ionizaron en aire por las cargas negativas del producto del 
bombardeo de X-ray de las cuales la carga del electrón puede ser 
derivada.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Robert millikan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Röntgenstrahlbombardierung</string>
